description: This undergraduate seminar unit is compulsory for undergraduate students who have been selected for the Industry Based Learning Program in the Faculty of Information Technology. It is a non-weighted unit and is taken in addition to any prescribed coursework. Students will be assessed on the basis of attendance and be granted a "Pass Grade Only (PGO)".The seminars are presented by the industry partners of the IBL program and are intended to provide the students with useful knowledge of current industry practise in IT. This seminar series should be attended prior to the completion of an IBL placement.
